A6.text: The Kalapalo have an oral story of the arrival of three explorers which states that the three went east, and after five days the Kalapalo noticed that the group no longer made campfires. The Kalapalo say that a very violent tribe most likely killed them.

A7.text: the bones provided by Comatzi turned out not to be those of Fawcett
